title: Did Melania Trump Plagiarize a Pamphlet for the ‘Be Best’ Campaign?
subtitle: The White House quickly corrected a statement on its web site claiming that a document written by the Federal Trade Commission in 2014 had been co-authored by First Lady Melania Trump.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Melania Trump plagiarized a document from the Federal Trade Commission for her "Be Best" campaign.
